entity.name: [EC Test] Trump ends press briefing early after question on COVID-19 testing

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH Interpretation of trump leaving COVID-19 Press briefing today bcz he didn’t like questions means trump can’t handle pressures & challenges of being president; it takes courage, knowledge, & skill to face the American Press! We have smart  courageous journalists! Out with trump!
